entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump I have faith in Pres Trump..He got economy jump started although Obama told him he’d need a magic wand to bring jobs back. POTUS will regain the losses incurred from COVID-19 and do even better. TRUMP 2020. The law and order candidate. We don’t want to live in a war zone! MAGA🇺🇸
